description: The Prime Minister, Shri Narendra Modi, today chaired his third interaction through PRAGATI - the ICT-based, multi-modal platform for Pro-Active Governance and Timely Implementation. Initiating today's interaction, the Prime Minister expressed satisfaction that PRAGATI was speeding up decision-makin…
caption: narendramodi.in
message:
Today's PRAGATI session had extensive deliberations on how to give impetus to ease of doing business & further increase the momentum built. 

Also discussed projects under Digital India initiative including digitisation of land records & integrating land records with Aadhaar at the earliest. Issues pertaining to the social sector that were discussed included Widow Pension Programme & the progress towards eradication of leprosy.

Like always, infra projects were reviewed. Implementation of Fasal Bima Yojana also figured in today's session. http://nm-4.com/dbyj
